Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tickets.model.group

Class Group

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tickets.model.group.Group
public class Group extends Object
The Group class knows its name, if there was a change, its categories, the current category, as well as the active ticket list. Group is able to add and edit both tickets and categories, as well as remove Category and save and export to a file
Author:
Carolina Adri Lima, Lalitha Edupuganti

    • saveGroup

      public void saveGroup(File groupFile)
      Method used to save and export the group into afile
      Parameters:
      groupFile - the name of the file to be exported to

    • getGroupName

      public String getGroupName()
      Method used to get the name of the Group object
      Returns:
      a String containing the name of the Group object

    • isChanged

      public boolean isChanged()
      Method that is used to get the isChanged field which determines whether the Group object has been changed or not
      Returns:
      false if the Group is saved, true otherwise

    • setChanged

      public void setChanged(boolean changed)
      Method that is used to update and set the value of the isChanged field
      Parameters:
      changed - a boolean that determines whether or not the Groupd has changed since the last save

    • addCategory

      public void addCategory(Category category)
      Method used to add a new Category to the list of categories as long as the cateogry name is not a duplicate or Active, which will cause an Exception to be thrown
      Parameters:
      category - the Categry to be added to the list of categories

    • getCategoriesNames

      public String[] getCategoriesNames()
      Method used to return the list of the name of the Categories in the Group
      Returns:
      a String array containing the name of the Categories in the categories list

    • setCurrentCategory

      public void setCurrentCategory(String categoryName)
      Sets the currentCategory field to the AbstractCategory with the given name in the parameter.
      Parameters:
      categoryName - the name of the AbstractCategory to be set

    • getCurrentCategory

      public AbstractCategory getCurrentCategory()
      Method used to return the current Category as an AbstractCategory
      Returns:
      the AbstractCategory that is the current Category

    • editCategory

      public void editCategory(String categoryName)
      Method used to edit the name of the currentCategory, throws an IAE if the name is a duplicate or matches the ActiveTicketList name
      Parameters:
      categoryName - the new name to be attributed to the currentCategory

    • removeCategory

      public void removeCategory()
      Method used to remove the currentCategory form the categories list. IAE is thrown if the currentCategory is an ActiveTicketList

    • addTicket

      public void addTicket(Ticket ticket)
      Method used to add a new ticket to the currentCategory
      Parameters:
      ticket - the ticket to be added

    • editTicket

      public void editTicket(int idx, String ticketName, String ticketDescription, boolean active)
      Mehtod used to edit a ticket's field(s) in the currentCategory
      Parameters:
      idx - the index of teh Ticket on the list
      ticketName - the name of the Ticket
      ticketDescription - the description of the Ticket
      active - whether the Ticket is active or not
